com.mobius.vdrapi.callbacks
Interface ICanPromptForKeyValue

All Known Implementing Classes:
com.mobius.vdrapi.command.PromptingCommandBase
public interface ICanPromptForKeyValue

A class implements the ICanPromptForKeyValue interface to indicate that it can, if necessary, prompt the user for a key value when parsing key value pairs. An object which implemented this interface would be called to handle the prompt.

See Also:
INeedPromptForKeyValue

Method Summary
 String promptForKeyValue(CommandKeyType key)
          Handles a prompt for a key value.
 

Method Detail

promptForKeyValue

public String promptForKeyValue(CommandKeyType key)
                         throws PromptNotAllowedException,
                                UserAbortException
Handles a prompt for a key value.

Parameters:
key - the key for which a value is being prompted.
Returns:
value that the object should use as the key.
Throws:
PromptNotAllowedException - thrown if for some reason the object is unable to prompt for this key.
UserAbortException - thrown if the user does not wish to enter a value at this time.
